name: GangBrawl
description:
Originally done for a university Introduction to Game Development Tools -course as the main course work. Original team size for this game is 6.

Controls

The game is designed to be played with a controller. However all the basic controls except aiming can be done using keyboard.

- However in the main menu controller support is not yet added and controllers can only be added in the lobby. :)

Lobby controls:

- Press any button to join. If player has joined, they can spawn simple AI by pressing  Triangle with PS controller or Y on XBOX controller.

- There will be spawned cursors, user must tap the start button with the cursor spawned. The cursor can be moved using joysticks.

Combat controls:

- Scheme is playstation controller / Xbox controller

- Shoot from R2 / RB

- Light Melee attack square / X

- Heavy melee attack Triangle / Y

- Fall through platform by pressing down

- Move and aim with joysticks.

- Jump with X / A
